name: Wolf in sheep's clothing
description:
The Game

"Wolf in sheep's clothing"  is a video game of visual novel genre where a series of experiences within a toxic relationship will be represented.  It is a video game that will teach the player a lot about a subject that is very present nowadays and that is not given as much importance as it deserves. This is a 3-day project for the Mini Jam 83, where the main theme was dread. We also added the limitation of implementing a dice as a mechanic and we chose to take advantage of the faces of a dice, as the different faces of the antagonist in the toxic relationship. 

Features
  • The purpose of the game is to communicate a message to society and to give visibility to such an important issue as toxic relationships and machism. In our opinion, it is a problem that is not given as much importance as it should be, but which we should all know a little more about. Therefore, we want to communicate this message and this information through this game.
  • This videogame implements the gameplay of the Top Down genre to lose that monotony that really follows the Visual Novel genre videogames.
How to play

The game will start with our protagonist taking a walk when suddenly someone who will change her life completely appears. You have to interact with the different objects scattered around the map and with some characters with the "Space" key in order to reach the end of the story.
